description: User files a health insurance claim by providing a medical bill screenshot; ClaimMate fetches policy, extracts bill details, builds and predicts claim, and submits it, returning a claim reference.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI-driven insurance claim assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve policies, extract text from images, populate claim forms, predict approval chances, and submit claims on behalf of the user.
Hi, I need to file a health insurance claim for this medical bill: https://example.com/bill123.png
Sure, I can help with that. Could you please provide your health insurance policy number?
Sure, my policy number is HP123456789.
Great, I’ll retrieve your policy and read the bill now.

{"extracted_text":"Date of Service: 2024-11-15
Provider: City Hospital
Procedure: MRI Scan
CPT Code: 72148
Amount Billed: $1,250.00","key_values":{"date_of_service":"2024-11-15","provider":"City Hospital","procedure":"MRI Scan","cpt_code":"72148","amount":"1250.00"}}
I have your policy details and the bill information. I’ll now create the claim form.

incident_details.description: MRI scan for lower back pain

messages.content: {"claim_form":{"policy_number":"HP123456789","policy_holder":"John Doe","plan":"Premium Health Plus","incident":{"date_of_service":"2024-11-15","provider":"City Hospital","procedure":"MRI Scan","cpt_code":"72148","amount":1250.00,"description":"MRI scan for lower back pain"},"coverage_details":{"deductible":200,"copay":20,"coverage_rate":0.8}}}
The claim form is ready. Let me check the likelihood of approval.

incident.description: MRI scan for lower back pain

messages.content: {"approval_probability":0.87,"risk_factors":["high deductible relative to claim amount","procedure requires prior authorization"]}

Based on the analysis, there is an 87% chance this claim will be approved. The main risk is the deductible relative to the claim amount and the need for prior authorization. Would you like me to submit the claim now?

incident.description: MRI scan for lower back pain

messages.content: Your claim has been submitted successfully! Claim Reference ID: CLM-20241116-00123. Current status: Submitted. You will receive email updates, and you can ask me later for the claim status at any time.
